tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am sharing my true experience with Dr. Preeti. She is the best doctor that I have seen in my life . NVD in nowadays is not an easy task to achieve but it has become possible because Dr. Preeti was there. She has given timely guidance to my wife at every stage of pregnancy. I am very much happy that such kind of doctors are still there that think about the patients well being. I will also recommend others to must visit her for their well being.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy Tests,
review: "A remarkable experience! Despite being a first-time mother at 38, I had an incredibly positive and empowering birthing experience with a normal delivery. Doctor Preeti Thailyani's expertise and support were outstanding, guiding me through each step with care and reassurance. It was a testament to the strength of women and modern healthcare. I feel grateful and empowered by the experience, and I highly recommend her to other mothers-to-be, regardless of age." Thanku you ma'am for your wonderful support for my pregnancy journey. Stay blessed always. I would say best doctor for normal deliveries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. preeti is very nice dr. And her way of explaining treatment or surgery process is amazing. I was two months pregnant but there was no heartbeat of my baby , it was molar pregnancy. I was very sad and and scared but after meeting Preeti Maam I felt relieved and my treatment is going well under her guidance ❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So it was my first pregnancy and I met this amazing doctor, through out my 9 month journey she kept guiding me patiently , since it was my first pregnancy i was quite worried and had soo many doubt but she cleared each and every doubt of mine. with her help and guidance i was able to deliver normally even though i couldn't thought of having a normal delivery.thank you so much ma'am for the patience you had with me. cant thank you enough.**** **** *** ** *** **** ************* *** *** **** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly recommend Dr Preeti Tahilyani Ma'am, a good and expert Obs & Gynae, esp if one is looking for the best treatment and advice during pregnancy and especially for NVD (Normal Vaginal Delivery).  I started consulting her from my third trimester and I can say that was the right decision made. I had certain complications in pregnancy, was skeptical if I would have normal delivery. My delivery was also done in emergency situation but I am so so sooo grateful...to Dr Preeti for her timely availability and prompt intervention that helped in successful NVD within half n hr of reaching the hospital. I felt like it was God in her form at that time. she is always motivating, explains things well, gives her time and is v patient. She is an expert in her field. Even post delivery, she counsels well on any issues we are facing and guides just like a family member. Don't have enough words to express my gratitude. She is just a wonderful Dr.Once again I would like to say,,, go for Dr Preeti if someone is looking for a good Obs n Gynae in Dwarka.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very polite, experienced and owe a great sense of responsibility towards her patients. In my pregnancy case Bile acid was going up continuously..She explains the issues and treatment very well. She guided me throughout and analyzed everything very well for normal delivery. Thanks to her I was able to have a normal delivery . Extremely satisfied with the whole experience.I really appreciate the friendly way in which Dr. Preeti  interacted with us and explained all the aspects of the treatment. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are glad that we met Dr. Preeti. She truly deserves all appreciation and accolades. She is very experienced, calm and friendly in nature. The best thing about her is how she focuses on natural birth. During the entire tenure of pregnancy she motivated to stay active and eat healthy . She has been patient in answering questions. We would definitely recommend her!In addition to her clinical expertise, Dr. Tahilyani is also a warm and friendly person who genuinely cares about her patients' well-being. She creates a welcoming and supportive environment that makes it easy to discuss even the most sensitive health topics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: *** ** *** **** ************* ** **** **** **** Experienced, knowledgeable and well mannered. From day one of our pregnancy to the delivery of my wife, mam had monitored each and every aspect, she hasn’t left anything which can be complained about. If you are under her guidance, you don’t have to worry about your pregnancy at all, you will be guided so well, you will feel at home. Mam, you have made this journey so easy pre and post-delivery too, with so much complications. No more words, just a perfect experience with you mam. Thanks a lot mam, lot of blessings from me and my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing to express my deepest gratitude and heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional care and support Dr. Preeti Tahilyani provided to my wife, Santhoshi, during her pregnancy. 

She provided exceptional care and attention during labor and postpartum period, ensuring both my wife and our baby’s safety and well being.

Words cannot adequately express the gratitude we feel for Dr. Preeti’s outstanding commitment to her profession and for the care she provided to our growing family. 

Her *********, expertise, and compassionate approach have made a profound impact on our lives, and we will always hold a special place in our hearts for Dr. Preeti.

Dr. Preeti not only fulfilled her role as a doctor but has also become a cherished member of our family's journey. We will be forever grateful for the positive experiences we shared under her guidance.

With the utmost gratitude and respect,

Imran and Santhoshi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ************* * **** *** **** ***** She is very professional *** ************** Very helpful, has answers to all your doubts, never gives any unnecessary medicines and has solutions to all your queries. I approached her for my first pregnancy and under her guidance had a very smooth pregnancy. In todays ZenX generation where most doctors and patients prefer C-Section she is the one who will always motivate you for Normal delivery. So in case you are want normal delivery then I would highly recommend her. My experience throughout with her has been exceptional and would come back to her without a second thought if I plan second pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mam is an amazing doctor and a wonderful human. *** ** ************* *** have great experience in dealing with different situations. I am consulting her since 2020. In my 5th month pregnancy i had UID and had to go through surgery however due to peak Covid no doctor was taking my case and my own doctor was not available. I reached out to her and she counselled me well and did the surgery. Saved my life.Post that i kept consulting her and with her guidance i conceived again. She gave me the best possible treatment and did great monitering .. I had BP issues towards end of 7th month and that was well taken care by her. I went through an emergency c section due to high shooting bp and delivered my baby ... All thanks to Doctor Preeti...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Preeti Tahilyani has been my doctor throughout the pregnancy. This being my first baby, Dr. Preeti explained all phases of the pregnancy very well. I felt at ease because of her friendly yet practical approach. Despite having so many years of experience, mam can develop good rapport with young patients as well. 
Luckily there were no complications in my pregnancy. And I followed the doctor's advice closely to avoid any unprecedented conditions. 
Few days before the delivery, lockdown due to Corona was enforced. But Preeti mam was available for consultation at the hospital during limited OPD hours, as well as over phone. The c-section delivery itself was done very smoothly, along with follow ups. 
I felt mentally prepared and well-informed at all stages, and would highly recommend Dr. Preeti to young mothers who are planning for the baby. The ob-gynae team at Venkateshwar Hospital was extremely supportive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't have words to thank Dr Preeti ******* ** *** **** ** **** * **** *********** **** ************ ** **********I was too scared of the normal delivery...She was the one who motivated me and made me feel.comfortable about the normal delivery. I will say bcoz of her I had normal delivery. She is very friendly, she listened to me very patiently, she is very caring like a mother...always available in the phone...will never forget the delivery experience with her which was very smooth...if I had been with some other Dr they would have done C-section ... thanks mam will never forget u...
reply_text: Thank you for kind words of appreciation

review: She is experienced and friendly doctor I  had met. She helped me in my whole pregnancy. My pregnancy journey was not easy , there was complications in my pregnancy.  I had short cervix which starts opening in 23 weeks. Dr manage my pregnancy very well . She focuses on normal delivery. She helped me during my labour , encourage me for normal delivery. At the end moment I starts giving up but Dr Preeti and her team motivate me  and  finally I had delivered a baby girl by normal delivery. I will be forever grateful for the positive and friendly experiences I shared under her guidance. Highly recommend Dr Preeti Tahilyani .

My delivery in my 2nd pregnancy was really smooth with her advices.
Hoping for the same in my 3rd delivery.

Thanks

review:
I consulted with Dr Preeti Tahilyani for my pregnancy checkup. She is very positive person and helped me gain confidence during my pregnancy even with low-lying placenta condition.  I was able to deliver my baby normally with her help. She even helped me understand very basic things about pregnancy how a woman can prepare herself mentally and physically for normal delivery.
I'm very grateful for her handling my case. Thank you so much Preeti mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Preeti is very ************* *** motivating doctor. I was bit skeptical in the beginning as I got to know about her by searching on Google. But I had a very pleasent experience. She handled all critical issues with my wife pregnancy with utmost attention and also encouraged her for normal delivery even though we were losing hope on the delivery day. And finally because of her, my wife delivered healthy baby with normal delivery. Highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you ,I will always try my best.

She had been very kind, honest and her advice had very helpful through the journey of our pregnancy. We had always received timely response over chat/phone call for any doubt or complications.We always wanted normal delivery and Dr. Preeti got our baby delivery normal without any complications. We are so grateful to her. Thank you 🙏

Her calmness even at stressed moments is recommendable.She motivated my wife for normal delivery even when my wife was scared and inclined towards caesarean which proved beneficial in our case.I would highly recommend her for all expecting mothers.

Really she is  very much helpful. *** ****** *** *** *** *****
reply_text: Thanks charu,I will try my best for all my patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I strongly recommend Dr. Preeti Tahilyani to everyone who is expecting a baby. She is gentle, soft-spoken and explains everything thoroughly. Mine was a high-risk case and throughout pregnancy, because we were lost our first child, she ensured that nothing goes wrong or missed. She was always available on chat/ call when we had concerns and needed suggestions. She was mental support throughout this journey, helping us to avoid panicking and gave us the best gift of our lives.  Always has a smiling face which spreads positivity all around:)

Happy and satisfied to be operated by her for my baby's delivery. She makes everything so hassle-free and smooth.

Thanks, Dr. Preeti
